titles.title: SF436 What shall I do my God to love

properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
What shall I do my God to love,
my loving God to praise?
The length, and breadth, and height to prove,
and depth of sovereign grace?

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines:
Throughout the world its breadth is known,
wide as infinity;
so wide it never passed by one,
or it had passed by me.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines:
My trespass was grown up to heaven;
but, far above the skies,
in Christ abundantly forgiven,
I see your mercies rise.

verse.name: v5
verse.lines:
The depth of all-redeeming love
what angel tongue can tell?
O may I to the utmost prove
the gift unspeakable!

verse.name: v6
verse.lines:
Come quickly, gracious Lord, and take
possession of your own;
my longing heart vouchsafe to make
your everlasting throne.
